import React,{useContext} from 'react' import { CInputGroup, CInputGroupPrepend, CInputGroupText, CInput, } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' import ArticleProvider from "../context/ArticleContext" const TitleInput =({actionType})=>{ const {article,updateArticle}=useContext(ArticleProvider.Context) return
{ actionType=="en" ? updateArticle("titleEn", e.target.value): updateArticle("titleFr", e.target.value) console.log("article",article) }} /> {/* */}
} export default TitleInput
